mapper.sql: A.film_id as A_film_id, A.special_features as A_special_features, A.rental_duration as A_rental_duration, A.rental_rate as A_rental_rate, A.release_year as A_release_year, A.length as A_length, A.replacement_cost as A_replacement_cost, A.rating as A_rating, A.description as A_description, A.language_id as A_language_id, A.title as A_title, A.original_language_id as A_original_language_id, A.last_update as A_last_update, A.fulltext as A_fulltext
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from film A
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
SELECT nextval('film_film_id_seq'::regclass) as film_id
insert into film (film_id, special_features, rental_duration, rental_rate, release_year, length, replacement_cost, rating, description, language_id, title, original_language_id, last_update, fulltext) values (#{filmId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{specialFeatures,jdbcType=ARRAY}, #{rentalDuration,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{rentalRate,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{releaseYear,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, #{length,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{replacementCost,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{rating,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{languageId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{originalLanguageId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{lastUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fulltext,jdbcType=OTHER})

SELECT nextval('film_film_id_seq'::regclass) as film_id
insert into film
film_id,
special_features,
rental_duration,
rental_rate,
release_year,
length,
replacement_cost,
rating,
description,
language_id,
title,
original_language_id,
last_update,
fulltext,

#{rentalRate,jdbcType=NUMERIC},

mapper.update:
update film A
A.film_id = #{row.filmId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
A.special_features = #{row.specialFeatures,jdbcType=ARRAY},
A.rental_duration = #{row.rentalDuration,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
A.rental_rate = #{row.rentalRate,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
A.release_year = #{row.releaseYear,jdbcType=DISTINCT},
A.length = #{row.length,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
A.replacement_cost = #{row.replacementCost,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
A.rating = #{row.rating,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.description = #{row.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.language_id = #{row.languageId,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
A.title = #{row.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.original_language_id = #{row.originalLanguageId,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
A.last_update = #{row.lastUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
A.fulltext = #{row.fulltext,jdbcType=OTHER},

update film A set A.film_id = #{row.filmId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, A.special_features = #{row.specialFeatures,jdbcType=ARRAY}, A.rental_duration = #{row.rentalDuration,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, A.rental_rate = #{row.rentalRate,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, A.release_year = #{row.releaseYear,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, A.length = #{row.length,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, A.replacement_cost = #{row.replacementCost,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, A.rating = #{row.rating,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A.description = #{row.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A.language_id = #{row.languageId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, A.title = #{row.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A.original_language_id = #{row.originalLanguageId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, A.last_update = #{row.lastUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, A.fulltext = #{row.fulltext,jdbcType=OTHER}

update film
special_features = #{specialFeatures,jdbcType=ARRAY},
rental_duration = #{rentalDuration,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
rental_rate = #{rentalRate,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
release_year = #{releaseYear,jdbcType=DISTINCT},
length = #{length,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
replacement_cost = #{replacementCost,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
rating = #{rating,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
language_id = #{languageId,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
original_language_id = #{originalLanguageId,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
last_update = #{lastUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
fulltext = #{fulltext,jdbcType=OTHER},
where film_id = #{filmId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update film set special_features = #{specialFeatures,jdbcType=ARRAY}, rental_duration = #{rentalDuration,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, rental_rate = #{rentalRate,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, release_year = #{releaseYear,jdbcType=DISTINCT}, length = #{length,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, replacement_cost = #{replacementCost,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, rating = #{rating,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, language_id = #{languageId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, original_language_id = #{originalLanguageId,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, last_update = #{lastUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, fulltext = #{fulltext,jdbcType=OTHER} where film_id = #{filmId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT A.film_id,A.special_features,A.rental_duration,A.rental_rate,A.release_year,A.length,A.replacement_cost,A.rating,A.description,A.language_id,A.title,A.original_language_id,A.last_update,A.fulltext,B.language_id as B_language_id,B.last_update as B_last_update,B.name as B_name,C.language_id as C_language_id,C.last_update as C_last_update,C.name as C_name,D.actor_id as D_actor_id,D.film_id as D_film_id,D.last_update as D_last_update,E.actor_id as E_actor_id,E.last_update as E_last_update,E.last_name as E_last_name,E.first_name as E_first_name,F.film_id as F_film_id,F.category_id as F_category_id,F.last_update as F_last_update,G.category_id as G_category_id,G.last_update as G_last_update,G.name as G_name,H.inventory_id as H_inventory_id,H.store_id as H_store_id,H.last_update as H_last_update,H.film_id as H_film_id FROM film A LEFT OUTER JOIN language B on B.language_id=A.original_language_id LEFT OUTER JOIN language C on C.language_id=A.language_id LEFT OUTER JOIN film_actor D on D.film_id=A.film_id LEFT OUTER JOIN actor E on D.actor_id=E.actor_id LEFT OUTER JOIN film_category F on F.film_id=A.film_id LEFT OUTER JOIN category G on F.category_id=G.category_id LEFT OUTER JOIN inventory H on H.film_id=A.film_id where A.film_id = #{filmId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT A.film_id,A.special_features,A.rental_duration,A.rental_rate,A.release_year,A.length,A.replacement_cost,A.rating,A.description,A.language_id,A.title,A.original_language_id,A.last_update,A.fulltext,B.language_id as B_language_id,B.last_update as B_last_update,B.name as B_name,C.language_id as C_language_id,C.last_update as C_last_update,C.name as C_name,D.actor_id as D_actor_id,D.film_id as D_film_id,D.last_update as D_last_update,E.actor_id as E_actor_id,E.last_update as E_last_update,E.last_name as E_last_name,E.first_name as E_first_name,F.film_id as F_film_id,F.category_id as F_category_id,F.last_update as F_last_update,G.category_id as G_category_id,G.last_update as G_last_update,G.name as G_name,H.inventory_id as H_inventory_id,H.store_id as H_store_id,H.last_update as H_last_update,H.film_id as H_film_id FROM film A LEFT OUTER JOIN language B on B.language_id=A.original_language_id LEFT OUTER JOIN language C on C.language_id=A.language_id LEFT OUTER JOIN film_actor D on D.film_id=A.film_id LEFT OUTER JOIN actor E on D.actor_id=E.actor_id LEFT OUTER JOIN film_category F on F.film_id=A.film_id LEFT OUTER JOIN category G on F.category_id=G.category_id LEFT OUTER JOIN inventory H on H.film_id=A.film_id
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO film(film_id,special_features,rental_duration,rental_rate,release_year,length,replacement_cost,rating,description,language_id,title,original_language_id,last_update,fulltext) VALUES (#{filmId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{specialFeatures,jdbcType=ARRAY},#{rentalDuration,jdbcType=SMALLINT},#{rentalRate,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{releaseYear,jdbcType=DISTINCT},#{length,jdbcType=SMALLINT},#{replacementCost,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{rating,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{languageId,jdbcType=SMALLINT},#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{originalLanguageId,jdbcType=SMALLINT},#{lastUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{fulltext,jdbcType=OTHER}) ON CONSTRAINT film_pkey DO UPDATE SET special_features=EXCLUDED.special_features,rental_duration=EXCLUDED.rental_duration,rental_rate=EXCLUDED.rental_rate,release_year=EXCLUDED.release_year,length=EXCLUDED.length,replacement_cost=EXCLUDED.replacement_cost,rating=EXCLUDED.rating,description=EXCLUDED.description,language_id=EXCLUDED.language_id,title=EXCLUDED.title,original_language_id=EXCLUDED.original_language_id,last_update=EXCLUDED.last_update,fulltext=EXCLUDED.fulltext WHERE film_id=EXCLUDED.film_id RETURNING *

INSERT INTO film(film_id,special_features,rental_duration,rental_rate,release_year,length,replacement_cost,rating,description,language_id,title,original_language_id,last_update,fulltext) VALUES
(#{item.filmId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{item.specialFeatures,jdbcType=ARRAY},#{item.rentalDuration,jdbcType=SMALLINT},#{item.rentalRate,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{item.releaseYear,jdbcType=DISTINCT},#{item.length,jdbcType=SMALLINT},#{item.replacementCost,jdbcType=NUMERIC},#{item.rating,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.languageId,jdbcType=SMALLINT},#{item.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.originalLanguageId,jdbcType=SMALLINT},#{item.lastUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{item.fulltext,jdbcType=OTHER})
ON CONSTRAINT film_pkey DO UPDATE SET special_features=EXCLUDED.special_features,rental_duration=EXCLUDED.rental_duration,rental_rate=EXCLUDED.rental_rate,release_year=EXCLUDED.release_year,length=EXCLUDED.length,replacement_cost=EXCLUDED.replacement_cost,rating=EXCLUDED.rating,description=EXCLUDED.description,language_id=EXCLUDED.language_id,title=EXCLUDED.title,original_language_id=EXCLUDED.original_language_id,last_update=EXCLUDED.last_update,fulltext=EXCLUDED.fulltext WHERE film_id=EXCLUDED.film_id RETURNING *
